mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order_main (id, order_main_no,coupon_number, create_time, state,pay_amount, order_date,consignee, mobile_phone,province_code,city_code,area_code, province_city_area, detail_address,logistics_company,express_order_no,is_send_sms ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{couponNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{orderDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{provinceCityArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{logisticsCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{expressOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSendSms,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update tbl_order_main set is_print_express=1 where id = #{id}
